title: Changing voice overs for the new client
body: I've found a lot of stuff on the internet saying that you can change the voice overs and language settings on the old league client . I tried doing so , but it only works for the legacy client, so is there any way we can change voice overs for the new client ? ( Specifically Japanese). Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/jJXEWUZe-changing-language-in-beta-client 
This does work although it also changes the text language

There *is* a way, but it breaks a lot of things and causes an *unspecified error* popup that won't go away. This is a key reason why we can't recommend making any sort of change to an unsupported language on your region. It's also a reason we cannot assist in making these types of changes.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you anyway ! Glad it got answered so i don't have to scramble through all the pages for it ^^ {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
{{champion:69}} {{summoner:11}} {{item:1402}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} srry dont know how to help
